articles.title: 72-year-old man jailed for slashing neighbour who later died of heart disease
articles.summary:
📰 싱가포르 최신 뉴스
📝 An autopsy found that these injuries were not fatal, and that Mr Chua's cause of death was ischaemic heart disease, Deputy Public Prosecutor Joseph Gwee said.  Mr Chua then called the second victim to accompany him and they went to Lim's flat together...
articles.content: An autopsy found that these injuries were not fatal, and that Mr Chua's cause of death was ischaemic heart disease, Deputy Public Prosecutor Joseph Gwee said. Mr Chua then called the second victim to accompany him and they went to Lim's flat together. 30am, police officers on patrol on the ground floor came across Mr Chua exiting the lift with severe head injuries. Mr Gwee also said that while Lim did not initiate the fight, he reacted disproportionately
